meanings.definition: Covered with multiple layers of coating.
meanings.sent1: The multicoated car shone brightly in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The new sunglasses were multicoated for extra protection.
meanings.sent3: The multicoated cake looked almost too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her multicoated smile hid her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The multicoated walls of the museum preserved the ancient paintings beautifully.

meanings.definition: Having multiple layers of coating applied.
meanings.sent1: The multicoated phone screen resisted scratches effectively.
meanings.sent2: The multicoated furniture had a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: The multicoated book cover felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent4: His multicoated armor protected him in battle.
meanings.sent5: The multicoated watch was both stylish and durable.
